mapper.select: select movie_id, genre_id, title, description, thumbnail, video_url, total_star, star_count, view_count from movie

SELECT m.movie_id, m.genre_id, m.title, m.title_sub, m.description, m.thumbnail, m.video_url, m.total_star, m.star_count, m.view_count, m.duration, TO_CHAR(m.release_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS releaseDate, g.genre_name AS genreName FROM movie m JOIN genre g ON m.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE m.movie_id = #{movieId}
